Description
Basketball
The Basketball class is a class that represents a basketball game This class extends the Game class to inherit common properties and attributes

The Football class is a class that represents a football game This class extends the Game class to inherit common properties and attributes
Game
The Game class is an abstract class that represents a general sports game.

The Hockey class is a class that represents a hockey game This class extends the Game class to inherit common properties and attributes

ScoringMethods
The ScoringMethods class is a class that represents methods for scoring in a game

The Soccer class is a class that represents a soccer game This class extends the Game class to inherit common properties and attributes
Team
The Team class is a class that represents a sports team with a name and score
